description:
Although Misao is excited by the return of her mentor and hero, she`s stunned to discover that Aoshi has betrayed one of their closest friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bir İttifak Kuruluyor: Aoshi ile Shishio`nun Bir Araya Geldiği Gün
Doumei Seiritsu: Aoshi ga Shishio to Te o Kunda Hi!
อาโอชิและชิชิโอะ
同盟成立・蒼紫が志々雄と手を組んだ日!
